abstract_ssm: Employee records, financial records, legal papers, estate material, correspondence, and miscellaneous items of B. Altman & Co. The collection also includes material relating to B. Altman & Co. president Michael Friedsam (president 1931-1931).
subject_ssm: Department stores -- New York (State)  -- New York.
Malicious prosecution -- New York (State)  -- New York.
title_ssm: Great Merchants of Early New York
